title: Sir Ed Davey meets King Charles at Windsor Castle months after boycotting Donald Trump banquet
tags: also included Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer;publicly declined an invitation to the state banquet hosted by the King for President Trump;King welcomes Sir Keir Starmer and Lady Victoria Starmer to royal residence;William tells Duchy of Cornwall tenant to ‘keep going’ after donating £5,000;William under pressure as Charity Commission to review Earthshot funding complaint;The GB News Editorial Charter
